explains: n. 人类（总称）；人性，人的属性；人道，仁慈；（历史、哲学、文学等）人文学科
wordGroup: crime against humanity 违反人道罪；危害人类罪

sentences.en: The massacre was a crime against humanity.
sentences.cn: 这场大屠杀是一桩反人类的罪行。

sentences.en: It helps engender a sense of common humanity.
sentences.cn: 它有助于引发一种共同的人道主义精神。

sentences.en: They stand accused of crimes against humanity.
